short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Minesweeper Mania Game as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Play more games on the top-left menu

Minesweeper Mania is a Chrome extension that adds a fun and challenging twist to the classic Minesweeper game. With Minesweeper Mania, you can play on different sized boards, with different numbers of mines, and with different scoring systems. You can also customize the look of the game with different themes and cursors.

- Free extension that is available to all Chrome users.
- Easy to install and use.
- Compatible with all major browsers.
- Regularly updated with new features and content.
- Great way to improve your problem-solving skills and hand-eye coordination.
- Great way to pass the time and relieve stress.
